mapper.select: select id, topic_name, content, comment_nums from topic
select id, topic_name, content, comment_nums from topic where id=#{id}
select b.user_id, a.user_name, b.`comment` from `user` a inner join (select user_id, `comment` from topic_comment where topic_id=1) b on a.id=b.user_id
mapper.insert: insert into topic (topic_name, content, comment_nums) values (#{topic.topicName}, #{topic.content}, 0)
